Name: Prohibiting vending vehicles or pushcarts from being placed over any ventilation grill, cellar door, manhole, transformer vault, or subway access grating.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting vending vehicles or pushcarts from being placed over any ventilation grill, cellar door, manhole, transformer vault, or subway access grating.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Consumer Affairs
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Section 17-315 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding a new subdivision m, to read as follows:
	m.  No vending vehicle or pushcart shall be placed over any ventilation grill, cellar door, manhole, transformer vault, or subway access grating.
      	Â§2.  This local law shall take effect ninety days after its enactment.









T.S.F.
08.08.06
